bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of blood from the lung being emitted through the mouth. This may or may not be accompanied by cough. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 48: 肺氣盛實，其氣上蒸，發嗽多痰，心 胸煩躁，往往咯血 , “The lung qi abounds to repletion. This qi rises like steam and coughs up much phlegm. The heart and chest experience vexation and restlessness. [Patients] again and again spit blood ”.

② Pathological Condition with blood spitting. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 68: 如患咯血，用前件藥末一兩，鄆州蛤粉 二兩 , “If someone suffers from blood spitting , take 1 liang powder of the pharmaceutical substance mentioned before plus 2 liang of ge fen from Yunzhou”.
